name: count_vowels
description: Create a Scratch program that takes a string as input and counts how many vowels (a, e, i, o, u) it contains (case-insensitive). The sprite should say the count.
instruction: Complete the given Scratch starter project that takes a string as input and counts how many vowels (a, e, i, o, u) it contains (case-insensitive). The sprite should say the count.

evaluation.description: Tests if the sprite correctly executes the task: count_vowels
